definition: A term used to describe individuals who possess a captivating and compelling quality that naturally attracts and influences others. It is commonly used to describe people who have a magnetic personality, charm, and the ability to inspire or persuade others through their presence and charisma.

examples.german: Der charismatische Führer gewann die Herzen der Menschen.
examples.english: The charismatic leader won the hearts of the people.

examples.german: Die charismatische Darstellung des Charakters überzeugte das Publikum.
examples.english: The charismatic portrayal of the character convinced the audience.
